song_name: Now Until the Moment You Die
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Now Until the Moment You Die is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Now Until the Moment You Die has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Minor,  and G Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
